snippet: Mr. Clinton, a longtime fan of Ms. Streisand's, will present the Chaplin Award to her at a gala held by the Film Society of Lincoln Center on April 22.
abstract: Mr. Clinton, a longtime fan of Ms. Streisand's, will present the Chaplin Award to her at a gala held by the Film Society of Lincoln Center on April 22.

headline.main: Bill Clinton to Present Film Society's Chaplin Award to Barbra Streisand
headline.print_headline: Clinton to Present Film Society’s Award to Streisand
